name: Easy Lemon Lover's Bundt® Cake
author: CorkiDeCat
summary: This is the best I have come up with to mimic Starbucks'® Lemon Cake. Family and friends agree, and it is so easy.
ingredients: ½ cup freshly squeezed lemon juice
1 (3 ounce) package instant lemon pudding mix
zest of 1 lemon, or more to taste
1 tablespoon poppy seeds, or more to taste  (Optional)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease and flour a fluted tube cake pan
Beat cake mix, sour cream, vegetable oil, lemon juice, eggs, pudding mix, zest, poppy seeds, and lemon extract in a bowl with an electric mixer on low speed for 1 minute
Increase speed to medium and beat for 3 minutes
Bake in preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 45 minutes
Cool in the pan for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack
